altTitles.ja: ヤンキー高校にお嬢様

altTitles.en: The Young Lady in a Delinquent High School

description.en:
Kiryuuin Yuri, a rich young lady, transfers to Mitsuya Private High School, a den of delinquents.

Her goal is to meet real delinquents and have heated one-on-one fights, like those in the delinquent manga she adores. However, contrary to her ideal, the reality is that she is surrounded by "trash" who are too presumptuous to even be called delinquents...

Bullies who rule the class, voyeurs who infest the train to school, abusive breeder in the neighborhood. 

A new refreshing action series begins as this lovely young lady beats up the scums in order to reach the top─!
description.ja: 悪名高い超不良高校に転校してきたのは可憐なお嬢様！？

title.en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh: 靠发小我变身顶级向导

description.en: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

When the war between the aboveground and underground ended, humanity was joined by so-called "dungeon babies," those gifted with supernatural abilities and an obsession with the labyrinths below ground. 

Despite being a dungeon baby, Kim Jinwoo suppressed his instincts, choosing to live an ordinary life as a guide and caring for his family. 

But when an expedition goes wrong and he somehow ends up becoming the new owner of a labyrinth, he discovers that he cannot ignore his instincts forever...
description.pt-br: Os descendentes da humanidade que nasceram no labirinto e foram criados com o leite dos monstros possuíam uma força especial e corpos fortes. Quando retornaram à Terra, a humanidade os chamou de bebês da masmorra. Entre eles, Kim Jinwoo nasceu no labirinto mais profundo. 'Eu nunca tentei ficar forte, eu só queria viver.' Desde o mais humilde dos escavadores até o rei do labirinto, sua história de vida agora está se revelando.

altTitles.en: Creepy Cat ~ My Strange Daily Life with a Cat ~

altTitles.ja: CreepyCat 猫と私の奇妙な生活

altTitles.ms: Kucing Seram - Kehidupan seharian yang pelik bersama kucing.

altTitles.uk: Моторошний кіт - Моє дивне життя з котиком

altTitles.ro: Pisica Ciudată - Viața Mea Zilnică cu o Pisică Ciudată

description.en: Flora just moved to an old house, but there's already a creepy cat living there. That's when their mysterious cohabitation began.
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

altTitles.ja: ガラクシアス

description.en:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898)

altTitles.ja: ニャンて男

description.en:
What if your dream date turns out to be a…cat? Such is the dilemma for Bonnie, a young woman who wanted love and ended up with Claude, a highly needy half-man-half-cat instead. Will they be able to make it work? Is sharing the litterbox going to be a huge problem? And what ARE her friends going to think? Read Meow Man to see how this big ball of yarn unfurls.  
  
  
Que feriez-vous si vous vous réveillez face à une personne mi-homme mi-chat ? Tel est la situation dans laquelle se trouve Bonnie…

title.en: Touhou - Ladies of Scarlet Devil Mansion

altTitles.ja: 紅魔館の女たち

description.en: A light-hearted comedy centered on the residents of the Scarlet Devil Mansion. Unofficial and non-canon. Published monthly in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.

title.en: Black Lagoon: Sawyer the Cleaner - Dismemberment! Gore Gore Girl

altTitles.ja: BLACK LAGOON 掃除屋ソーヤー 解体！ゴアゴア娘

altTitles.ja-ro: Black Lagoon Soujiya Sawyer - Kaitai! Gore Gore Musume

altTitles.ru: Черная лагуна: Расчленяющая уборщица Сойер! Окровавленная девушка

description.en: Sawyer is a cleaner who takes on the task of disposing of unwanted people in Roanapur, a city of vice where the mafia and other scoundrels thrive. Her daily life is depicted in a funny, sometimes horror-filled, sometimes action-packed, and even fantastical way as she goes about her work with her beloved chainsaw in hand. Her good friends and fellow freelancers Shenhua and Lotton, as well as familiar characters from the main story, such as Revy and Rock, also make appearances!

altTitles.ja: マジメサキュバス柊さん

description.en: The strait-laced Kusakabe found out that his prim OL neighbor Hiiragi-san is actually a succubus! She didn't want to do anything criminal, so she got a normal job to earn money for a place to live and make a living first. Now she's ready to properly suck a man dry! Will Kusakabe be able to resist Hiiragi-san's supernatural charm?

title.en: Touhou - The Magician Who Loved a Fake (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 偽物に恋した魔法使い
廃墟のメシ

description.ja: かつては星々の領域まで進出していた人類がその覇権を失ってから千数百年の時が過ぎた。無人工場が生み出す完全食品「コモンブレッド」だけが人々を生き延びさせている時代、探索師の少女ハルカはコモンブレッド至上主義をかかげる「教会」の目を逃れながら、広大な廃墟を旅していた。

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

altTitles.en: Ambivalent: A World Where You Die If You Lose Your Virginity

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Sadao Shindo, who has no sexual experience, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

title.en: Hakumei & Mikochi: Tiny Little Life in the Woods

altTitles.ja: ハクメイとミコチ

altTitles.th: ฮาคุเมกับมิโคจิ

description.en:
Nine centimeters (3.5 inches) tall, the tiny girls Hakumei and Mikochi live in the forest. 
Living in a house in a tree, riding insects and birds, and making umbrellas out of leaves, they live a happy and comfortable life. Follow their tiny but lovely lives as they live their day to day in a fantastic world of inchlings, animals, and strange happenings.  
  
**#EverydayHeroes Scans Note:**  
Chapter 39 is next after 34. No chapters were skipped, as we switched to using Harta magazine raws, and the chapters from the magazine use a different numbering system.

title.en: Hell Mode ~Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru~

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

title.ja-ro: Sekkaku Cheat o Moratte Isekai ni Ten'i shita n dakara, Suki na You ni Ikitemitai: The Comic

altTitles.en: Might as Well Cheat: I Got Transported to Another World Where I Can Live My Wildest Dreams!

altTitles.fr: Puisque j'ai reçu un sort surpuissant et que j'ai été transporté dans un nouveau monde, je vais vivre comme je l'entends

altTitles.ja: せっかくチートを貰って異世界に転移したんだから、好きなように生きてみたい　THE COMIC

altTitles.ko: 모처럼 치트를 받아서 이세계에 전이했으니까, 맘대로 살고 싶어

altTitles.en: I GOT A CHEAT and moved to another world, so I want to live as I like.

altTitles.ru: Я получил читерскую способность и был перенесен в иной мир, так что теперь я буду жить, как сам того захочу

altTitles.zh: 难得拿到外挂转生至异世界，就想要随心所欲过生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 難得拿到外掛轉生至異世界，就想要隨心所欲過生活

description.en:
An official manga adaption by Butcha-U of a Light Novel by Munmun with Character Designs by Mizuryu Kei.  
  
After dying in an accident 30-year-old Satou Taro gets transferred into another world by god. Blessed with a cheat like ability to heal injuries and create curatives, Satou Taro adopts the moniker "Tarou" and begins his new life as a merchant. This time, he's going to live as he likes.

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%9B%E3%81%A3%E3%81%8B%E3%81%8F%E3%83%81%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88%E3%82%92%E8%B2%B0%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A6%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E3%81%AB%E8%BB%A2%E7%A7%BB%E3%81%97%E3%81%9F%E3%82%93%E3%81%A0%E3%81%8B%E3%82%89%E3%80%81%E5%A5%BD%E3%81%8D%E3%81%AA%E3%82%88%E3%81%86%E3%81%AB%E7%94%9F%E3%81%8D%E3%81%A6%E3%81%BF%E3%81%9F%E3%81%84)
description.ja:
事故死した三十路サラリーマン・佐藤太郎は神からの要請で異世界に転移した。
治療系チート能力をもらった佐藤太郎はタウロと名を変え新たな人生を歩む。
旅先での人との触れ合い、挫折と成長、強敵たちとのアッツ～イ戦い—— 異世界に新たな波紋を生んだ漢のサクセス（？）ストーリー開店!!

Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting, the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!

Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

description.en:
Misuzu Haruno, a handsome high school girl, has a secret identity—she is a super warrior known as Burning X who seeks to protect the peace. She wishes to become cute, just like the beautiful super heroine she admires, Blue Wing. But the truth is, Blue Wing is actually Aoi Ootori, an effeminate boy from the class next door! Indeed, Blue Wing is *his* secret identity, but he isn't exactly thrilled about it—he wants to be strong and more manly, just like his idol, Burning X.

This is a romantic comedy in which two people are unable to reveal their true identities to each other.

description.en:
***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

description.ja:
いたって普通の少年、日向祥太。そんな彼は専属のメイドさん・黒椿亜梨沙と一緒に暮らしていた。
容姿端麗、頭脳明晰、何をやらせても完璧な彼だけの女の子。しかし彼女、絶対零度の無表情なうえに、祥太をことあるごとにからかいまくって、ちょっとエッチなご奉仕もしようとする謎多きメイドさんだった!!
亜梨沙に恋心を抱く祥太は、彼女にふさわしくなるために、どうにか男らしさを保とうとするが…果たして、肉食系Ｓメイドを祥太は止められるのか!!?

セクシー系漫画界の風来坊、7zu7の人気同人誌「ボクんちのメイドさんたち。」を一般誌化!!
背伸びしたい系男子が無表情メイドに迫られまくる、理性蒸発ラブコメ!!!!!

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

description.en: One day, Kang, president of the Hakcheon faction, receives an unpleasant package. It's an old broken rope. Thinking it might be a gift from the perverts who usually take an interest in him, he goes to the destination written on the delivery box to strike back. There he finds Jungwoo, another Korean gangster.  As Jungwoo wraps a rope around his neck and tightens it, he feels strange. Jung-woo, who has noticed that Kang has started to get hard, spits out an incredulous laugh. Unlike Kang, who thinks it's just a physiological phenomenon, Jung-woo realizes how miserable he can make Kang Joo-han, proud as a cock. Kang Joo-han is then forced to have sex with Jung-woo. He swears at him and rejects him, but on the other hand, he feels pleasure for the first time.

Nhờ việc được Tiến Sĩ cải tiến để tối ưu sức mạnh, Mira đã có được một hình thái mới, và hình thái này cưng vãi ò luôn!Đón đọc ngay câu chuyện romcom giữa hai thế lực thiện ác chí chóe không ai nhường ai nha!

description.en: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.

description.en:
Ten years after being transported to another world. 

It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first, felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan, after being unsuccessful for so long. 

It was then that a job offer found its way to him — it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.
description.ja: 突如、異世界へ転移したトールは、地球に帰還する手段を探し、ソロ冒険者として活動するが、九年間手掛かりを得る事が出来なかった…。十年目にしてこの世界で生きていく事を決意したトールだったが、ある依頼による“訳ありの双子”との出会いがトールの運命を大きく変える事になり!? ぼっち最強冒険者と頭脳明晰な双子とゆく、気ままな文明開化の異世界旅が始まる！

description.en:
Ichika, a college student, was interacting with a boy named Cecil from another world through a hand mirror she held in her storeroom. One day, her older sister, Karen, suddenly disappeared, and at the same time her hand mirror also disappeared. A year later, as soon as Ichika picked up her hand mirror that she found by chance, she was sent to another world. There was Cecil, who had grown older, and Karen, who had become a saint by calling herself Ichika for some reason?! In a world where her name and memories are stolen by her older sister, a different world doting fantasy opening up for her destiny!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00203256010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59656), [Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8693)
description.ja:
大学生の一花は、物置で手にした手鏡を通し異世界のセシルという少年と交流していた。
そんなある日、姉の華恋が突然失踪し、同じタイミングで手鏡も消えてしまう。

1年後、一花は偶然見つかった手鏡を手にした途端、異世界へと飛ばされていた。
そこにいたのは年上に成長したセシルと、なぜか一花と名乗り聖女となっていた華恋でー！？

姉に名前や思い出を奪われた世界で、運命を切り開いていく異世界溺愛ファンタジー開幕！

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00203256010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59656), [Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8693)
description.zh-hk:
大學生一花通過在儲藏室找到的手鏡，可以與異世界名為塞希爾的少年交談。
但某一天，姐姐華戀突然失蹤了，一同消失的，還有聯通異世界的手鏡。

1年後，一花偶然間找到了手鏡，被傳送到了異世界。
在那裡出現了長大成人的塞希爾，與不知為何，自稱一花的聖女華戀─!?

在這個被姊姊奪走了姓名與回憶的世界裡，改變命運的異世界溺愛奇幻物語開啟了序幕！

---

description.ja: マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.ja: となりのフィギュア原型師

description.en: Ryutaro Hando is a figure prototype maker, a person who creates the basis for mass production of figures. He is a skilled but somewhat socially awkward member of the workshop he has joined. This yonkoma story can be enjoyed by both figure lovers and those who are not interested in figures.
description.ja: 半藤隆太郎は個人で活動するフィギュア原型師。原型師とはフィギュアなどの大量生産の元になるものを作る人で、腕は確かだが、少々人付き合いが苦手な彼が入った工房のメンバーは見た目子供の工房代表、美少女好き、クリーチャー好きと超個性的で、彼らは、手先は器用、でも生き方は不器用。フィギュア好きも、フィギュアに関心がなくても楽しめるワイド４コマ。

altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンの幼なじみ

altTitles.vi: Người Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Trong Hầm Ngục
Bạn thuở nhỏ của tôi là trùm cuối hầm ngục

description.en: At the bottom of an impregnable underground dungeon awaits the final boss, the mighty black dragon Obsidian. The one who dared to challenge Obsidian is Van, an experienced adventurer who has fought many battles with the dragon over the years.
description.ja: 難攻不落の地下ダンジョンの主リューカ。これに挑むは歴戦の剣士ヴァン。両者のプライドを賭けた熱き戦いが今、幕を開ける……。 かと思いきや実は二人は幼なじみで――！？
description.vi: Dungeon x Bạn thuở nhỏ !? Hãy cùng theo dõi họ, trong câu chuyện hài hước lãng mạn ấm áp này nhé! Dưới tầng sâu nhất của một hầm ngục bất khả xâm phạm, kẻ đang chờ đợi là con rồng đen hùng mạnh Obsidian. Người dám thách thức Obsidian là Van, một mạo hiểm gia giàu kinh nghiệm, người đã chiến đấu nhiều trận với con rồng trong nhiều năm qua. Trận chiến giữa hai tâm hồn ngây thơ đáng yêu sắp bắt đầu—!

altTitles.ja: 王子様の友達
A Prince of a Friend
学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

altTitles.ja: T・Pぼん

description.en: There exists a secret organization that has members traveling across time to save people from their wrongful deaths. Bon Namihira accidentally learn about the Time Patrol, and is recruited as an apprentice member. Together with Ream, the patroller in charge of mentoring him , Bon goes to various historical periods to rescue innocent people, trying not to alter history in the process.

altTitles.en: Older Sister Yuki is a Sensual Girl

altTitles.ja: ゆき姉ちゃんの官能ごっこ

description.en: First year Highschool boy Shin Yuki stumbles one day upon his naked childhood friend, Yukino Kurose, reenacting a sensual scene with an mannequin in an empty classroom. She is a third year student who wants to experience first hand scenes from the book she reads and wants Yuki to help her! Things get a bit complicated though as her favorite books are erotic literature….
description.ja:
ピカピカの高校１年生・結城晋には好きな人がいる。それは、本が好きで地味でオッパイが大きい年上の幼なじみ・黒瀬雪乃だ。しかし、地味な文学少女だと思っていた雪乃には秘密があった。それは「官能小説のエッチなシーンを真似」という、ヤらしすぎる"ごっこ遊び"だった!!
そんな彼女の秘密を知った晋は、知りたがりすぎる雪乃のごっこ遊びに巻き込まれていき...!!?

こんな青春送りたかった!! 文学少女で地味なあの娘とナイショの"大人のごっこ遊び"♪

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

title.en: The Otome Heroine's Fight for Survival

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル
乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル＠ＣＯＭＩＣ

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game no Heroine de Saikyou Survival

altTitles.fr: L'héroine d'un jeu otome survie en devenant la plus forte

altTitles.en: Strongest Survival with an Otome Game's Heroine

description.en:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she’s determined to carve her own path.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
description.ja:
剣と魔法の世界シエルで孤児として生きていた少女アーリシア。
ある日、彼女は自分が“乙女ゲームのヒロイン”であると知ってしまう。
両親の死さえ単にストーリーの一部だったのだ。
アーリシアはヒロインの役割を「くだらない」と一刀両断すると、冒険者『アリア』を名乗り、次第に複数の武器と魔法を操る「殺戮（さつりく）の灰かぶり姫」へと成長していく！
だが、“悪役令嬢”の護衛依頼を受けたことで、気付かぬ間に貴族同士が争うゲームの舞台に巻き込まれていき――？
「私は“私”だ。ゲームの登場人物じゃない！」
武器を作れ！　技を鍛えろ！
強敵との戦いに生き残り、乙女ゲームをぶち壊せ！
戦うヒロインが魅せる、壮絶＆爽快な異世界バトルファンタジー！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1391fj/)
Light Novel: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09FF4Y8C2), [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/286726/)
Original Web Publication: [Corona EX](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/20000000054623), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54623)
description.ru:
В мире меча и магии, что звался Сиэль, жила сирота по имени Алисия.
Однажды она узнала, что является героиней отомэ-игры, в которой даже смерть её родителей была лишь частью сценария. Расценив положение героини полнейшим абсурдом, она решительно его отвергнула. Она переродилась как авантюристка Ария, и шаг за шагом мастерски овладела широким арсеналом оружия и магии. Её величали «Пепельная принцесса резни»! Однако, взявшись за задание по охране «злодейки», Алисия, опомниться не успев, обнаружила себя втянутой в конфликты знати…

«Я - это я, а не персонаж какой-то игры!»

Выковать оружие! Закалить тело!
Выжить в борьбе против могущественных врагов и разнести эту чёртову отомэ-игру!
Захватывающая битва нашей героини в величественном мире меча и магии!

---

altTitles.ja: 霧尾ファンクラブ

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

altTitles.ja: 枕魚

description.en:
I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya.    The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself.    

(Source: AniList)
description.ru: Странные будни странной девочки в странном городе, полном странных созданий.

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!
